title: Special Weather Statement
area: Burney Basin, Eastern Shasta County; Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Northern Lake County; Northeast Foothills, Sacramento Valley; Northern Sacramento Valley; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park
detail: ...SIGNIFICANT WEATHER ADVISORY FOR NORTHERN PLUMAS...NORTHEASTERN TEHAMA...NORTHEASTERN BUTTE...CENTRAL SHASTA AND LASSEN COUNTIES UNTIL 815 PM PDT... At 651 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking scattered strong thunderstorms from Western Shasta County west of Lakehead, and eastward into the Redding area to southeast of Whitmore to Mineral
summary: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 6:58PM PDT by NWS

title: Flash Flood Watch
area: Lassen-Eastern Plumas-Eastern Sierra Counties; Surprise Valley California
detail: ...FLASH FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PDT THIS EVENING... The Flash Flood Watch continues for * Portions of northeast California and Nevada, including the following areas, in northeast California, Lassen-Eastern Plumas-Eastern Sierra Counties and Surprise Valley California.
